nodes.text: Sulamar was a Moff in the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars. This Moff led the Javin sector's Nineteenth Army from its headquarters on the planet Javin.

Sulamar was first mentioned in The Essential Guide to Warfare, by Paul R. Urquhart and Jason Fry. Before the publication of the Essential Guide, another Imperial of the same name had been introduced in the novel Darksaber. It is interesting to note that that Sulamar, an Imperial technician, was in charge of the Darksaber Project, while Moff Sulamar was the head of the Nineteenth Army, also called "Dark Saber Command."
